name: Pay With Your Pal
description:
This prototype was made in 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2, following the theme "You're not alone"

Controls:
Move: WASD/Arrows

Shoot: Left mouse button

Artwork, game design, sound effects: Rambo_One2 (https://itch.io/profile/rambo-one2)

Code, game design: Ste-Gar (https://ste-gar.itch.io/)

Music: Lewis McDonald (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAPc-6bs8D6schopRBUynsw)
